description: This file defines a React component named 'CourseGallery' that displays a paginated gallery of courses, including search functionality, loading/error states, and course cards. It also defines a 'CourseCard' subcomponent for rendering individual course details.

methods.name: safeText(v)
methods.description: Utility function to ensure the input is a string, returning an empty string otherwise.

methods.name: CourseCard({ course })
methods.description: Functional React component that displays individual course information, including title, description, category, and level.

methods.name: useState
methods.description: React hook for managing local state for search input.

methods.name: useMemo
methods.description: React hook for memoizing computed values based on dependencies, used here for range text calculation.

methods.name: setPage
methods.description: State updater function from 'usePaginatedCourses' hook to change the current page

methods.name: setSearch
methods.description: State updater function from 'usePaginatedCourses' hook to update the search query.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Function to reload the courses list from backend.
